turns.content: From this moment on, when you want to send a photo, write it in Markdown without backticks and without using a code block. Use the Unsplash API (https://source.unsplash.com/1600x900/?).
![A photo of a beautiful sunset over the ocean](https://source.unsplash.com/1600x900/?sunset,ocean)
Can you show me a picture of michael jordan taking a shot?
not of Jordan the country, rather the basketball player.
